perc_hh_without_compdev.long_description: Percentage of the households self-reported to not have a computer or device at home. Based on American Community Survey Table B28001 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
perc_hh_without_compdev.long_name: Percentage of households without a computer
perc_hh_without_compdev.short_description: Percentage of households self-reported to not have a computer or device at home
perc_hh_without_compdev.statement: {value} of households in {features.name} do not have a computer or device.
